parameters.name: DomainNames
parameters.description: The domain names. Separate multiple domain names with commas (,). Only domain names registered with Alibaba Cloud are supported.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The description of the domain name.

parameters.name: TargetUserId
parameters.description: The destination user ID. The domain names and their Domain Name System (DNS) records are transferred to the destination user ID.
